question: Which engineering consultancy company prepared the detailed report of the Agra Metro Project ?
option1: RITES (Rail India Technical and Economic Service Limited)
answer: RITES (Rail India Technical and Economic Service Limited)
explanation: The project will help boost Ease of Living of the people of Agra and will benefit the tourists visiting the city. The estimated cost of the project is Rs 8,379.62 crores. The project is to be completed in five years. The feasibility study of the Agra Metro Project was conducted in 2016. The Detailed Progress Report of the project was prepared by RITES (Rail India Technical and Economic Service Limited).
